name: Valour (Zack-Kahea Game Developer)
description:
A Trimester 2 College project. Perhaps one day i'll come back and refine the idea.

High concept

Barons claim the lands and businesses of those who work hard, occupying resources and preying on the weak and poor. You and a friend must team up, become heroes and stand up to this evil. Explore various locations, each with their own unique design and challenges to overcome.

What a dangerous time to be alive…. Will you triumph? Will your name make it to the hall of heroes? Or will you merely be forgotten…
